title: About Me
content: I am a highly skilled Front-End Developer with expertise in JavaScript, TypeScript, and React.js, specializing in building high-performance, scalable, and user-centric web applications. With a deep understanding of Microfrontend architecture, I deliver seamless digital experiences that engage users and drive business growth. In addition to my front-end development capabilities, I have hands-on experience with major cloud platforms like Google Cloud Platform (GCP), Amazon Web Services (AWS), and Microsoft Azure, enabling me to design, deploy, and optimize applications that are scalable and efficient. My passion for Machine Learning has led me to explore cloud-based AI solutions, where I integrate advanced algorithms to enhance user experiences and improve application performance. I thrive in fast-paced environments where innovation and problem-solving are at the core. I am always eager to learn and adapt to new technologies, and my strong background in both front-end development and cloud infrastructure makes me a valuable asset for any team looking to build the next-generation of web applications.
